about_the_game:
About the Game

In a post-war world where the boundaries between science and mysticism have been erased, you are a lone detective of shadows, torn between dirty work and an obsessive drive to save those around you.

You investigate a series of sinister experiments, navigating the labyrinthine slums and sterile corporate labs, through bloody rituals and scientific discoveries that were never meant to be made.

Cults

The emptiness left in the wake of a long and brutal war drives the survivors toward mysticism. Numerous sects and spiritual movements emerge, overshadowed by the Church of the Gnosis — a sovereign state with its own army and inquisition — seeking to control as many minds as possible.

The "Biological Miracle"

Governments loosen restrictions on pharmaceuticals and genetic engineering, paving the way for thousands of manufacturers to flood the market with cheap designer drugs, stimulants, and modifiers. Cloning and gene editing become everyday realities.

Cities witness the rise of altered humans and intelligent mutant monsters fighting to claim their rights among the rest of the population.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of killing people and monsters. Scenes of alcohol and tobacco use.
